content: **knitted hat / hipster hat with rib in drops sky ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no skip-152 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m m/l fits head size approx 54/56 56/58 cm **materials** drops sky from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100 g colour 11 hazelnut needles drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm **knitting gauge ** 23 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
